definition: to overturn/to collapse/to lean/to tend/to incline/to pour out
towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...

sentences.english: We should rectify the undesirable tendencies in time.
sentences.chinese: 不良傾向一冒尖兒就不要放過它。

sentences.english: Watch out for harmful tendencies and deal with them the moment they crop up .
sentences.chinese: 不良傾向一冒尖兒就不要放過它。
